mission.posting: Network conglomerate Sysco has a resource we will need to take down ICaRUS

email.subject: Acquire Resources
email.body:
With the aftermath of that attack, it is imperative that we stop F-Stop and ICaRUS once and for all. To do that, we will need some resources. Now, a contact of mine at the CSA has told me that Sysco is under investigation for developing illicit port crushers. It is your job to break in to Sysco and snag a copy of any port crushers we don't have yet. Upload it to the drop server once you get it.
-L

attachments.note: Break into Sysco Find where they keep their port crushers Steal a copy of any we don't have Upload to drop server
